mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule(noteNum, userCode, subject, color, sday, eday, stime, etime, repeat, repeat_cycle, memo, regDate) VALUES(schedule_seq.NEXTVAL, #{userCode}, #{subject}, #{color}, #{sday}, #{eday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{etime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repeat}, #{repeat_cycle}, #{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE )
mapper.select: SELECT noteNum, subject, sday, eday, stime, etime, color, repeat, repeat_cycle, memo, regDate FROM schedule WHERE noteNum = #{noteNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE schedule SET subject=#{subject}, color=#{color}, sday=#{sday}, eday=#{eday, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stime=#{stime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, etime=#{etime, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repeat=#{repeat}, repeat_cycle=#{repeat_cycle}, memo=#{memo, jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE noteNum=#{noteNum} AND userCode=#{userCode}
